channel.title: Ip connection problems
channel.description:
Okay need some help here ive tryed many 718 clients changed the ip to my ip my no-ip tryed any ip i could find not a thing worked for hosting.
i did canyouseeme.org port 43594 it could see me it was open
did google status checker it could see my server was online and play able
i changed the 127.0.0.1 ip's to my no-ip doesnt work still for anyone they cant connect.
my anti viruis if down and my firewalls are down nothing is working at all
i was wondering is a webclient could fix this problem and if someone can link me a tutorial for making a 718 webclient thanks
